value:
$WmMPID_比翼アルム,ch10_00_Arum_MF_Pair,Face|If this contest is one of compassion,
I won't lose to anyone! Especially on
the Day of Devotion!$k$p$nMPID_セリカ|Mother Mila, please help Alm find
the courage and confidence he needs
to reveal what lies in his heart...$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ルドルフ,ch10_26_Rudlf_M_Valentine20,Face|...Let us begin.$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭エフィ,ch10_06_Efi_F_Valentine20,Face|Aw! I'm not done giving Alm all his
gifts yet though... Let's make this
quick so we can get back to it!$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭シルク,ch10_23_Silque_F_Valentine20,Face|Please allow me to help you all as
well, to thank you for the work you
all do every day.$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭コンラート,ch10_24_Conrad_M_Valentine20,Face|And I've got to put my best foot
forward—for Anthiese! Come on,
everyone. Let's go!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_02,0|$WmMPID_愛の祭ルドルフ,ch10_26_Rudlf_M_Valentine20,Face|It will soon be time for this festival
to come to a close...$k$p$WmMPID_比翼アルム,ch10_00_Arum_MF_Pair,Face|Um...Your Excellency?$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ルドルフ,ch10_26_Rudlf_M_Valentine20,Face|Yes, Alm? What is it?$k$p$WmMPID_比翼アルム,ch10_00_Arum_MF_Pair,Face|I wanted to give you these flowers...
as a way of thanking you for the
gift you gave me, that is.$k$p$nMPID_セリカ|We picked them out together. Would
you do us the honor of accepting
them, Your Excellency?$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ルドルフ,ch10_26_Rudlf_M_Valentine20,Face|A gift from my son...and the princess
of Zofia?$k$pThank you, Alm...and you, Anthiese.
It would be my honor to accept this
gesture of kindness from you two.$k$p$WmMPID_比翼アルム,ch10_00_Arum_MF_Pair,Face|Great! Oh, and, uh...I have a lot
I want to ask you. I was hoping
we could...talk?$k$pIf it's not too much trouble, I mean.
And it doesn't have to be a long talk
or anything. I was just thinking, y'kn—$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ルドルフ,ch10_26_Rudlf_M_Valentine20,Face|I would be glad to have such an
opportunity. After all, I have much
to tell you, and little wish to hurry.$k$p$WmMPID_比翼アルム,ch10_00_Arum_MF_Pair,Face|R-really? I mean...great! I've had
these questions for so long, I can
hardly wait, Father!$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ルドルフ,ch10_26_Rudlf_M_Valentine20,Face|I believe it. We have much to catch
up on, you and I...$k$p$WmMPID_セリカ,ch10_00_Arum_MF_Pair,Face|I'm so happy you two have been
able to connect thanks to this year's
festival! Now, if you'll excuse me...$k$p$nMPID_比翼アルム|Huh? You're leaving, Celica?$k$p$nMPID_セリカ|I can't very well intrude on a private
father–son conversation, now can I?$k$p$nMPID_比翼アルム|Of course you can! Besides, without
you, I'd be too busy stammering to
have gotten this far!$k$p$nMPID_セリカ|Oh, Alm... One of these days, you're
going to have to start acting your age.$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ルドルフ,ch10_26_Rudlf_M_Valentine20,Face|Oho-ho-hahaha!$k$p$Sbs150|
